about_the_game:
Welcome to Moonlight Rabbits – an enchanting idle game where relaxation meets ambition!

Embark on a delightful journey with a group of adorable rabbits with an astronomical goal: reaching the Moon! In Moonlight Rabbits, you'll help these fluffy astronauts build a towering stack of rabbits, reaching ever closer to the stars, all by collecting the one thing they love most – carrots!

key Features:

🥕Soothing Gameplay: Enjoy a stress-free gaming experience designed to help you unwind and relax.

🥕Cute and Whimsical Graphics: Immerse yourself in charming visuals that bring the world of Moonlight Rabbits to life.

🥕Discover Unique Rabbits: As you build your rabbit tower, unlock and meet a variety of unique rabbit characters, each with their own special traits and styles. Explore the diversity of your fluffy crew as you progress in the game, adding layers of fun and surprise to your lunar quest.

🥕Engaging Idle Mechanics: Collect carrots even when you're not playing, and come back to see your rabbits' progress and growth.

🥕Heartwarming Story: Follow your rabbits as they aspire to lunar adventures, making friends and overcoming cute challenges along the way.

Enjoy a cute and heartwarming story !!

Moonlight Rabbits is the perfect game for players of all ages looking for a relaxing retreat filled with goals, growth, and adorable rabbits. Can you help them reach the Moon? Start building your rabbit tower today and soar to new heights in this magical idle adventure!

name: Moonlight Rabbits

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Dive into the serene world of Moonlight Rabbits, an idle game where you help adorable rabbits build a tower to the Moon by collecting carrots. Unlock unique rabbits, enjoy relaxing gameplay, and achieve your lunar dreams in this charming adventure!
